title: How to Make Mocha Chocolate Cookies

steps.headline: Spread butter or cooking oil onto the baking pan.
Mix the flour, baking powder, and salt.
Beat the egg, butter, and sugar in another bowl with an electric mixer.
Add coffee and vanilla extract to the butter and sugar bowl.
Gradually add the flour mix and to the wet ingredient until a creamy dough is formed.
Form small cookies (about 1 tablespoon) and place them 1 ⁄2 inches (3.8 cm) apart on the baking sheet.
Place a Hershey Kiss on top of each cookie.

text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Spread butter or cooking oil onto the baking pan.  Mix the flour, baking powder, and salt.  Beat the egg, butter, and sugar in another bowl with an electric mixer.  Add coffee and vanilla extract to the butter and sugar bowl.  Gradually add the flour mix and to the wet ingredient until a creamy dough is formed.  Form small cookies (about 1 tablespoon) and place them 1 ⁄2 inches (3.8 cm) apart on the baking sheet.  Place a Hershey Kiss on top of each cookie.  Bake for 12-15 minutes.  Finished.
